name: 7th_son
text: A comment left by 7th_son was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by evolume, Deusoma, Darthemed)

name: fell
text: Chubbied for the fact your avatar adds a strange sense of shock to your comment.

name: catachresis
text: Teodor jumps as if Mr. Bear has interrupted him watching porn. This is strange, unless he is quick on the Alt-Tab.

name: featurelessvoid
text: Well, he is basically writing porn.

name: lawbot
text: But Cornelius does that too.

name: dovey
text: He probably thought it was Ray for a second

name: nagsworth
text: I always thought he was naturally jumpy after the Nice Pete incident, but this makes a lot more sense.

name: cjfoster
text: it seems possible that teodor was making the ad for himself until mr. bear showed up.

name: vandenbos
text: I don't know.  I'm not sure how Yahoo! Personals works, but Mr. Bear walked in (apparently) while Teodor was on Step 2.  Step 4 mentions a username, rsmuckles, that we didn't see him enter, so I have to assume it was part of Step 1.

name: cjfoster
text: you are a gentleman and a scholar. consider your comment chubbied.

name: untilyouaresonude
text: Oh Lord I'm glad I got to where I don't use the word "peepee" anymore.

name: evolume
text: seriously.  these days it's "neenur" all the way.

name: norrin
text: I'm partial to either "weiners," even though I'm refering to a singular subject, or "Mr. Peepers."

name: tekende
text: The one-eyed champ is also good. For talking about "slap-boxing the one-eyed champ," you know?

name: tekende
text: I am also partial to calling it my "wee Willy Wonka". Or "Mr. Wonka" if you're not into the whole brevity thing.

name: fineoakstructure
text: "Mr. Wonka"...if you're nasty?

name: changuitotuerto
text: Perhaps more appropriate for if you ARE into the whole brevity thing. If I could give you half a chubby here I would.

name: random_shorts
text: You are partial to weiners?

name: mcnubbins
text: Smokes? Racially.

name: stuart
text: Socially.

name: mcnubbins
text: I know, but the strip was making way too much sense for me.

name: featurelessvoid
text: Facially.

name: spinynorman
text:
That implies that you are familiar with other orifices smoking.

That is a thing that gives a dude's haunches some serious raising.

name: farqussus
text:
You raise hackles.

Raising haunches would involve the back of your thighs moving vertically. This seems unlikely.

name: spinynorman
text: This is true.

name: spicyponyhead
text: One would have to raise one's haunches to get a cigarette in there, no?

name: farqussus
text: eww

name: shutup_shutup
text: I had this strange feeling at first that "You raise hackles" was some obscure insult.  I'm kind of disappointed it wasn't.

name: farqussus
text: Your Mum raises hackles

name: deusoma
text: Man, Stephen Fry makes every damn thing you say classier than hell. Even when you're talking about ass-smoking.

name: achilleselbow
text: I take it you  have never been to Amsterdam...

name: heccibiggs
text:
Hahahaha imagining this said out loud is the funniest thing ever - I literally laughed until I had tears in my eyes. Thank you, italic formatting.

It reminds me of panel 3 here.

name: snowman
text: I'm with you on this.

name: changuitotuerto
text: Especially

name: apocowarg
text: the word "Helpless" completely makes this one for me.

name: roomba
text:
I like Italian food
and I like to Do It after
I eat Italian food

name: blarghamagarky
text: samsies

name: blarghamagarky
text: samesies. is so bad at internet

name: songbirdspectre
text: uhhh. i want to know about this box 4587

name: dusty
text: but cats do raise their haunches when they Do it, as well as people who are in positions in which upward from the ground is not vertical to their body. Just a second I'll make up a diagram...

name: spenham
text: Hobbes would know...

name: dusty
text: I feel compelled to change my icon in light of certain postings by a Dr.Manflesh

name: jthm_guitarist
text: Achewood always capitalizes 'Do It.'

name: dusty
text: thats because when we Do it, it's proper.

name: fosters
text: I like that they are to be helpless to stop Ray from pouring wine on his business.

name: shadowlink97
text: putting the word 'Helpless' in was what made it a 5 for me.

name: tekende
text: That is a picture of me, I am the cat, not the robot

name: rykan
text:
I thought that said 11 Vinho Verde for a second.
I was so excited.
